views.view: SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Persoon [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.Persoon](T1.Persoon_Id, T1.Persoon_Naam, T1.Persoon_Geboortedatum, T1.Persoon_Email) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Persoon_Id, T.Naam AS Persoon_Naam, T.Geboortedatum AS Persoon_Geboortedatum, T.Email AS Persoon_Email, True AS _from0 FROM MijnContext.Personen AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Product [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.Product](T1.Product_Id, T1.Product_Omschrijving2, T1.Product_Prijs) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Product_Id, T.Omschrijving2 AS Product_Omschrijving2, T.Prijs AS Product_Prijs, True AS _from0 FROM MijnContext.Producten AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing ProductPersoon [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.ProductPersoon](T1.[ProductPersoon.Product_Id], T1.[ProductPersoon.Persoon_Id]) FROM ( SELECT Key(T.Product_Klanten_Source).Id AS [ProductPersoon.Product_Id], Key(T.Product_Klanten_Target).Id AS [ProductPersoon.Persoon_Id], True AS _from0 FROM MijnContext.Product_Klanten AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Personen [CodeFirstDemo2NuInHetEchie.Persoon](T1.Persoon_Id, T1.Persoon_Naam, T1.Persoon_Geboortedatum, T1.Persoon_Email) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Persoon_Id, T.Naam AS Persoon_Naam, T.Geboortedatum AS Persoon_Geboortedatum, T.Email AS Persoon_Email, True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.Persoon AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Producten [CodeFirstDemo2NuInHetEchie.Product](T1.Product_Id, T1.Product_Omschrijving2, T1.Product_Prijs) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Product_Id, T.Omschrijving2 AS Product_Omschrijving2, T.Prijs AS Product_Prijs, True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.Product AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Product_Klanten [CodeFirstDemo2NuInHetEchie.Product_Klanten](T3.[Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Source], T3.[Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Target]) FROM ( SELECT -- Constructing Product_Klanten_Source CreateRef(MijnContext.Producten, row(T2.[Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Source.Id]), [CodeFirstDemo2NuInHetEchie.Product]) AS [Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Source], T2.[Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Target] FROM ( SELECT -- Constructing Product_Klanten_Target T1.[Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Source.Id], CreateRef(MijnContext.Personen, row(T1.[Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Target.Id]), [CodeFirstDemo2NuInHetEchie.Persoon]) AS [Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Target] FROM ( SELECT T.Product_Id AS [Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Source.Id], T.Persoon_Id AS [Product_Klanten.Product_Klanten_Target.Id], True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.ProductPersoon AS T ) AS T1 ) AS T2 ) AS T3
